verses.roman:
premāveśe prabhu kahe 'kṛṣṇa' 'kṛṣṇa'-nāma
ekale premāveśe kare śata-janera kāma

synonyms: prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; prabhu—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; kahe—says; kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa-nāma—the holy name of Lord Kṛṣṇa; ekale—alone; prema-āveśe—in ecstatic love; kare—does; śata-janera kāma—the work of hundreds of men.
translation: As Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was vibrating the holy name of Kṛṣṇa in ecstatic love, He Himself was performing the work of hundreds of men.
